meanings.definition: Of or relating to the nucleolus.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the nucleolar structure of the cell.
meanings.sent2: The nucleolar changes were crucial for cell division.
meanings.sent3: The tiny nucleolar details made the cell biologist chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her focus on the nucleolar aspects of the nucleus was like finding a hidden treasure.
meanings.sent5: The bright nucleolar colors under the microscope were unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the small, dense region within the nucleus of a cell.
meanings.sent1: The nucleolar area was where the genetic material was concentrated.
meanings.sent2: The nucleolar density indicated the cell's activity level.
meanings.sent3: The nucleolar spot looked like a tiny planet in the cell universe.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to the nucleolar core was like a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent5: The nucleolar mass pulsed with energy under the microscope.
